RelatedSentence: Preceded by four police motorcyclists and two on horseback , the funeral cortege moved slowly down the High Street to the church for a service led by the Reverend David Bolt who described Capt Clarke as someone who made a big impact on everyone 's life .

Preceded by four police motorcyclists and two on horseback , the funeral cortege moved slowly down the High Street to the church for a service led by the Reverend David Bolt who described Capt Clarke as someone who made a big impact on everyone 's life .
Standing in the crowd , 81 - year - old James Brown , a friend of Capt Clarke 's grandparents said : It is a very sad day .

A1: It gives you faith in humanity
RelatedSentence: Physiotherapist Lucinda Davis , who was also standing in the crowd lining the streets , said : It gives you faith in humanity .
